name: Professor Battle
description:
The professors in this office are always pretentious, and there is no so-called friendship between them. The only thing they have in common is that they both like to bring gadgets (the prototype of the cards) from the labs to the office. One morning, Dr. Bald found a coffee stain on his table inexplicably. He was furious and began to question the others in the office. The people in the office also started to blame each other,  and finally, the fighting breaks out...

How to use playcard,io to import this game: https://playingcards.io/docs/room-import-export

https://playingcards.io/
